mapper.insert: insert into board(title,content, writer_id, latitude, longitude, room_type, contract_type, rental_fee, address, write_date, deleted) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer_id}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{room_type}, #{contract_type}, #{rental_fee}, #{address}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select title, latitude, longitude, address from board
